slide.title: Round Robin DNS

list.bullet: Uses DNS to give out different IPs in a circular fashion
Limited control over which server gets requests

slide.example: www.example.com. 60 IN A 10.45.67.1 www.example.com. 60 IN A 10.45.67.2 www.example.com. 60 IN A 10.45.67.3 www.example.com. 60 IN A 10.45.67.4

list.bullet: A short TLL is important to avoid caching
